Orthopyroxene data from Lucey, JGR-E, E1, 1703-1714, 1998
To calculate the real index use Eqn 8a , Lucey 1998

n_opx=1.768-[0.118* Mg #], Mg # 0-1.0

to calculate the imaginary index use columns 2 and 3 below

k(lambda)=col 2 + [Mg# * col 3]valid from 0.4 <= Mg# <= 1.0

col1 is wavelength, micrometers
	col 1		col 2		col 3
